pluginHighlight: Export Figma Variables as production-ready shadcn/ui theme variables, Tailwind CSS configuration files, or CSS Variables.

shadcnUi.title: shadcn/ui theme integration
shadcnUi.description: Directly export Figma Variables as shadcn/ui theme configurations. Support multi-brand, multi-theme design systems with streamlined development workflow.

multiMode.title: Multi-mode variable system
multiMode.description: Manage complex design systems with light/dark themes, brand variations, responsive breakpoints, and density modes in combined exports.

mergeTypographyStyles.title: Typography variable merging
mergeTypographyStyles.description: Automatically combine font-size, line-height, letter-spacing, and other typography properties into unified Design Tokens, avoiding repetitive configuration.

cssMediaQueryMode.title: Media query mode export
cssMediaQueryMode.description: Export Design Tokens that have different values under different media query conditions for responsive design variable management.

unitConversion.title: Smart unit conversion
unitConversion.description: Intelligently convert px to rem, em, and other units, ensuring accessibility compliance and consistent scaling across devices.

typography.title: Typography system
typography.description: Suggestions for organizing text and typography variables

figmaTemplate.heading: Figma template
figmaTemplate.title: Includes basic variables needed to build Design Tokens
figmaTemplate.description: Start building your own Design Tokens here, including variables for colors, spacing, fonts, and more, with multiple modes for themes, brands, devices, and density.

example.heading: Example
example.title: Example
example.description: Easily make shadcn/ui components support different brand color themes, density modes, dark and light themes, and border radius styles.
example.note: Simply set variables in Figma to use shadcn/ui to create your design system and easily extensible.
